name: Relic Coffret: Talia — Kingdom of Banditry

embeddedItem.name: Relic Coffret: Talia — Kingdom of Banditry
embeddedItem.desc: A device used to collect and restore the Lightdust in the Fragmentum to its original form. Use this to obtain a random 5-star relic from the Talia — Kingdom of Banditry set.
embeddedItem.lore:
You never know what's in the box until you open it.

"So it's essentially like buying a lottery ticket?"
"At least we don't need to worry about finding a cat that is both dead and alive."
